issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When a request is made for DescribeAvailabilityZones without verbose it only returns the specified AZ.

{noformat}
[root@h-12 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones one
AVAILABILITYZONE	one	available
[root@h-12 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones two
AVAILABILITYZONE	two	available
{noformat}

But when a request is done with the "verbose" flag, it returns all the AZs in the cloud.
{noformat}
[root@h-12 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones verbose two
AVAILABILITYZONE	one	10.111.5.13 arn:euca:eucalyptus:one:cluster:CC_13/
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- vm types	free / max   cpu   ram  disk
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.small	0006 / 0008   1    256     5
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- t1.micro	0006 / 0008   1    256     5
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.medium	0004 / 0005   1    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.medium	0003 / 0004   2    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.large	0003 / 0004   2    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.xlarge	0003 / 0004   2   1024    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.xlarge	0003 / 0004   2   2048    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.xlarge	0003 / 0004   2   2048    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.xlarge	0001 / 0002   4   2048    15
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.2xlarge	0001 / 0001   2   4096    30
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.2xlarge	0001 / 0001   4   4096    30
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   3072    60
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   4096    60
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hi1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   6144   120
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc2.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   6144   120
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cg1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   12288   200
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cr1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   16384   240
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hs1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  48   119808  24000
AVAILABILITYZONE	two	10.111.5.23 arn:euca:eucalyptus:two:cluster:CC_23/
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- vm types	free / max   cpu   ram  disk
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.small	0015 / 0016   1    256     5
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- t1.micro	0015 / 0016   1    256     5
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.medium	0010 / 0010   1    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.medium	0007 / 0008   2    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.large	0007 / 0008   2    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.xlarge	0007 / 0008   2   1024    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.xlarge	0007 / 0008   2   2048    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.xlarge	0007 / 0008   2   2048    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.xlarge	0003 / 0004   4   2048    15
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.2xlarge	0002 / 0002   2   4096    30
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.2xlarge	0002 / 0002   4   4096    30
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   3072    60
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   4096    60
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hi1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   6144   120
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc2.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   6144   120
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cg1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   12288   200
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cr1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   16384   240
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hs1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  48   119808  24000
{noformat}

Also the behavior is not inline with other EC2 resource calls.
e.g
{noformat}
[root@h-12 ~]# euca-describe-instances verbose i-47a051d8
RESERVATION	r-ba475980	668012134892	casey-group-0
INSTANCE	i-47a051d8	emi-f6319851	euca-10-111-52-38.eucalyptus.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-52-73.eucalyptus.internal	running	casey-key-0	0		m2.xlarge	2015-02-12T07:18:23.831Z	one	eki-fd4e2ffd	eri-a814c713		monitoring-disabled	10.111.52.38	10.111.52.73			instance-store					paravirtual		873a2f27-f4be-414c-aee1-f45efca9c2e4	sg-f7b2e1ae				x86_64
TAG	instance	i-47a051d8	euca:node	10.111.5.78
{noformat}
fields.summary: DescribeAvailabilityZones should honor the requested zone name when "verbose" is present in the request

comments.body:
Describing regions and availability zones should be tested for regressions. The test system should have multiple availability zones.

Testing should also cover the use of filters, so:

{code}
#
# euca-describe-regions 
REGION	eucalyptus	http://10.111.1.54:8773/services/Eucalyptus
# 
# 
# euca-describe-regions eucalyptus
REGION	eucalyptus	http://10.111.1.54:8773/services/Eucalyptus
# euca-describe-regions foo
# 
# 
# euca-describe-regions --filter region-name=eucalyptus
REGION	eucalyptus	http://10.111.1.54:8773/services/Eucalyptus
# euca-describe-regions --filter region-name=eucalyptu
# 
# 
# euca-describe-regions --filter region-name=eucalyptu?
REGION	eucalyptus	http://10.111.1.54:8773/services/Eucalyptus
# 
# 
# euca-describe-availability-zones 
AVAILABILITYZONE	one	available	
#
#
# euca-describe-availability-zones verbose
AVAILABILITYZONE	one	10.111.1.54 arn:euca:eucalyptus:one:cluster:one-cc-1/	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- vm types	free / max   cpu   ram  disk	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.small	0011 / 0011   1    256     5	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- t1.micro	0011 / 0011   1    256     5	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.medium	0005 / 0005   1    512    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.medium	0005 / 0005   2    512    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.large	0005 / 0005   2    512    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.xlarge	0005 / 0005   2   1024    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.xlarge	0003 / 0003   2   2048    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.xlarge	0003 / 0003   2   2048    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.xlarge	0003 / 0003   4   2048    15	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.2xlarge	0001 / 0001   2   4096    30	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.2xlarge	0001 / 0001   4   4096    30	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   3072    60	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   4096    60	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hi1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   6144   120	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc2.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   6144   120	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cg1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   12288   200	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cr1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   16384   240	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hs1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  48   119808  24000	
#
#
# euca-describe-availability-zones verbose one
AVAILABILITYZONE	one	10.111.1.54 arn:euca:eucalyptus:one:cluster:one-cc-1/	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- vm types	free / max   cpu   ram  disk	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.small	0011 / 0011   1    256     5	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- t1.micro	0011 / 0011   1    256     5	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.medium	0005 / 0005   1    512    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.medium	0005 / 0005   2    512    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.large	0005 / 0005   2    512    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.xlarge	0005 / 0005   2   1024    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.xlarge	0003 / 0003   2   2048    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.xlarge	0003 / 0003   2   2048    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.xlarge	0003 / 0003   4   2048    15	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.2xlarge	0001 / 0001   2   4096    30	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.2xlarge	0001 / 0001   4   4096    30	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   3072    60	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   4096    60	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hi1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   6144   120	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc2.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   6144   120	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cg1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   12288   200	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cr1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   16384   240	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hs1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  48   119808  24000	
#
#
# euca-describe-availability-zones verbose --filter zone-name=one
AVAILABILITYZONE	one	10.111.1.54 arn:euca:eucalyptus:one:cluster:one-cc-1/	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- vm types	free / max   cpu   ram  disk	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.small	0011 / 0011   1    256     5	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- t1.micro	0011 / 0011   1    256     5	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.medium	0005 / 0005   1    512    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.medium	0005 / 0005   2    512    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.large	0005 / 0005   2    512    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.xlarge	0005 / 0005   2   1024    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.xlarge	0003 / 0003   2   2048    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.xlarge	0003 / 0003   2   2048    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.xlarge	0003 / 0003   4   2048    15	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.2xlarge	0001 / 0001   2   4096    30	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.2xlarge	0001 / 0001   4   4096    30	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   3072    60	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   4096    60	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hi1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   6144   120	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc2.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   6144   120	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cg1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   12288   200	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cr1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   16384   240	
{code}
Verified with same commands shown by [~sjones].
